name: Apochic - A World Without Languages
description:
In a world where people seems to be speachless, you must complete your duty as a postman in a countryside city.

Commands:

SPACE - It is the main action button. Press to delivery letters to the houses with the exclamation sign (!) and to talk with the population.

AWSD / ARROW KEYS - Moves the player.

The game is finished when all letters are successfully delivered.
